biography: Mikko, a golfer of considerable repute from Kurk Golf, is known for his meticulous approach to the game. His strategic thinking on the course is only matched by his calm and collected demeanor.

Though Mikko has made only one appearance in past Hector Trophée events, his presence is always noted. While the coveted Hector Trophée and the individual Victor trophy have eluded him thus far, his dedication suggests future contention.
Currently, Mikko is not slated to participate in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025. However, given his unwavering commitment to the sport, a last-minute entry would surprise no one.
